message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want a larger share, but I need to be fairly compensated as well. How about 52-48?
I'm willing to compromise, 58-42 is my new offer.
This is getting us nowhere.  Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
I'm still willing to compromise, 56-44 is my new offer. Time is running out!
Alice, we're running out of time!  This is hurting me more than you.  I'll take a slight hit at 48-52.  Take it or leave it!
